page.title: 17HEALTH
page.content: {SOUTHWATER SURGERY}IS REALLY A HEALTH CENTRE,WITH 2 CONSULTING ROOMS, TREATMENT ROOM,RECEPTION AND WAITING AREA.UPSTAIRS ARE 3 OFFICES.ONE DOCTOR IS IN THE PRACTICE DR.B.M.BARKER,WITH A PRACTICE ADMINISTRATOR,2 RECEPTIONISTS,1 NURSE RECEPTONIST,AND A SECRETARY.SOCIAL WORKERS ATTACHED TO THE SURGERY AND EMPLOYED BY THE LOCAL AUTHORITY ARE A COMMUNITY PSYCHIATRIC WORKER,A HEALTH VISITOR,A DISTRICT NURSE,A COMMUNITY MIDWIFE.THE CENTRE HAS DAILY SURGERIES IN THE MORNING AND 3 AFTERNOONS A WEEK.THERE ARE 3 BABY CLINICS AND ONE IMMUNISATION CLINIC A MONTH.IT GIVES ANTE-NATAL AND POST- NATAL CARE.DR.BARKER IS THE FIRST VILLAGE DOCTOR,HE CAME IN SPRING 1980. BEFORE, PEOPLE WENT TO HORSHAM.UNTIL 1985 THE SURGERY HAD A DISPENSARY BUT THE GROWING VILLAGE NEEDED A CHEMIST, AND SOON THERE WILL BE ANOTHER DOCTOR.
